descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Gray Aegis Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Authors[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures, adaptation, screenshots
9RedMen - navmeshes
PlagueHush - DSR-compatibility support editing

[color=#ffff00]Version[/color]: 1.2 (DSR-compatible)

[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds Gray Aegis shield from TES4: Oblivion. It can be obtained in the unmarked Imperial guard post East from Solitude. This shield provides 30% Magic Resistance and can be upgraded with a quicksilver ingot.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]
Also:

author: Ronnie Magnum and PlagueHush
